name: 101 Doors (itch)
description:
A platformer-maze game that full of doors that could teleport you to somewhere else but you can't immediately tell where would you go when you choose to enter the door. luckily i already provide you with some blue print of the room that give you information about sign that once was in the door.

Some door gonna flip the gravity and some door is doesn't exist because i running out of time lol

WASD to move | Q to open Blueprint | E to enter the door

Issues note :

- I didn't implement ground detection yet so please don't press jump more than once xd

- It sometime register the enter button twice, idk if that because of my keyboard or something else
